title: 1.12.2工业枪械服崩溃
author: KM_xiaoliu
txt_content:
我个人分析了一下，主要是工业2和枪械FLAN的问题，求解决办法forge.cfg文件已经修改
    B:removeErroringEntities=true  
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=true
简要奔溃日志：
 [Server thread/ERROR]: Exception caught during firing event net.minecraftforge.fml.common.gameevent.TickEvent$ServerTickEvent@74eb2492:
java.lang.StackOverflowError: null
        at ic2.core.block.TileEntityBlock.collisionRayTrace(TileEntityBlock.java:396) ~[TileEntityBlock.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity.func_180636_a(BlockTileEntity.java:539) ~[BlockTileEntity.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.state.BlockStateContainer$StateImplementation.func_185910_a(BlockStateContainer.java:461) ~[awu$a.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147447_a(World.java:1134) ~[amu.class:?]
        at com.flansmod.common.guns.raytracing.FlansModRaytracer.raytraceBlock(FlansModRaytracer.java:176) ~[FlansModRaytracer.class:?]
        at com.flansmod.common.guns.raytracing.FlansModRaytracer.raytraceBlock(FlansModRaytracer.java:207) ~[FlansModRaytracer.class:?]


求求各位神通给个解决办法
